sourcesContent:
import classnames from 'classnames' import { REVEAL_TIME_MS } from '../../constants/settings' type Props = { value?: string status?: number isRevealing?: boolean isCompleted?: boolean position?: number } export const Cell = ({ value, status, isRevealing, isCompleted, position = 0, }: Props) => { const isFilled = value && !isCompleted const shouldReveal = isRevealing && isCompleted const animationDelay = `${position * REVEAL_TIME_MS}ms` console.log("Cell", "value", value, "status", status) const classes = classnames( 'w-14 h-14 border-solid border-2 flex items-center justify-center mx-0.5 text-4xl font-bold rounded dark:text-white', { 'bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-600': status == undefined, 'correct shadowed bg-green-500 text-white border-green-500': status == 0, 'present shadowed bg-yellow-500 text-white border-yellow-500': status != undefined && (status < 0 && status > -5), 'present shadowed bg-orange-500 text-white border-orange-500': status != undefined && (status <= -5 && status > -10), 'present shadowed bg-blue-500 text-white border-blue-500': status != undefined && (status > 0 && status < 5), 'present shadowed bg-purple-500 text-white border-purple-500': status != undefined && (status >= 5 && status < 10), 'cell-fill-animation': isFilled, 'cell-reveal': shouldReveal, } ) return (
{value}
) }
